headline: Cathie Wood Is on a Buying Spree. Here Are 10 Stocks She Just Bought.
summary: The investing world has taken note that investing legend Warren Buffett has been a net seller of stocks for the past 10 quarters.  Ark Invest head Cathie Wood, for example, continues to pick up shares of her signature disruptive tech stocks for her firm's exchange-traded funds (ETFs).  Shopify (NASDAQ: SHOP) is one of the largest e-commerce companies in the world, but it doesn't sell retail products to consumers -- it provides e-commerce software and hardware to the businesses that do the selling.

headline: Could Buying Pool Corp Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: Pool Corp is a retailer that sells pool supplies.  The company gained notoriety following the news that Berkshire Hathaway had invested in the stock.  Pool Corp's business is interesting and inherently growth oriented.
